title: Basketball Socks for Men,Performance Cushioned Men's Athletic Crew Socks with Arch Compression for Cycling Basketball
description: 【Excellent performance 】men's socks high top calf protection, raised sock tube, protect the calf to reduce friction, thickened protection, ankle position thickened design,men's sports socks effective anti-friction ankle protection, arch girdle design, more snug fit palm of the foot does not slip

【Easy on and off 】Unlike other basketball performance socks, our socks are more flexible and easier to put on and take off. The materials we use are of the highest quality and provide long-lasting performance even when worn daily. This results in a very durable material that is sure to withstand regular washing and continuous movement without wear and tear

【Quality material running socks】sports socks made of 75.1% cotton, 22.5% polyester and 2.4% spandex, men's athletic socks are made of pure cotton, soft, flexible, stretchable, breathable and sweat-absorbent, and absorb good water without smothering sweat
【Best Fit Size】 The basketball sports socks 5 pairs are suitable for men 7-11. Best for hiking, biking, camping, running, jogging, mountain biking, travel, tennis, golf and other outdoor activities.

【Satisfaction Service】Speum men's and women's socks have always been committed to bringing customers the best shopping experience. We check the quality of our socks at all levels. If you are not satisfied with our socks, please feel free to contact us and we will give you a satisfactory solution
